name: STASIS (itch) (Alexander Mastryukov, ZuhairGhias)
description:
You awaken in a mysterious facility with an ominous voice presiding over you. It is there to assist you in completing a simple task: keeping the plants alive. But things aren’t as they seem, and you feel like you might be in danger from a unexpected threat.

Music Used:

  • Mycelium by lookyan (with special permission from label to remix and adapt)
  • Cybernator (Abby Lee Tee Cyberwars Rebot) by Pixelord

Updates:

21/04/20: Increase movement speed, remove glitchy wall in greenhouse, clarify final puzzle notes.
